definitions.definition: An act of righting a wrong; compensation .
Clipping of amendment ( “ alteration or change for the better ” ) .
examples: I've sent over a new version of the doc with some amends .
definitions.label_groups: informal , of a document , usually in the plural

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) An act of righting a wrong; compensation .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , of a document , usually in the plural ) Clipping of amendment ( “ alteration or change for the better ” ) .
